ygData.subject: RE: Lined Vials
ygData.msgSnippet: my humble apologies, I made the mistake of thinking that Poison Vials were a type (like Sealed, lined). I stand corrected, and you saved me from a horrible
ygData.messageBody:
my humble apologies, I made the mistake of thinking that Poison Vials were a
type (like Sealed, lined). I stand corrected, and you saved me from a
horrible mistake. I Stand corrected.

-----Original Message-----
From: Conrad Lesnewski [mailto:clesnew@...]
Sent: Wednesday, November 24, 1999 8:47 PM
To: EQ_Potters@onelist.com
Subject: RE: [EQ_Potters] Lined Vials


From: Conrad Lesnewski <clesnew@...>

ALL vials are poison vials. The question was whether we needed Lined Vials
- the 2nd of the three poison vial templates (Vials, Lined Vials, and
Sealed Vials). We do not. At this time we only use the first template .
Trust me, I've used this spell to make and sell upwards of 30 sets of Wu's
Gauntlets.

Calbasil Psyrex of Ak'anon (Bertoxx)
House of Silmindo



At 01:27 AM 11/24/99 -0600, you wrote:
>From: John F Vanden Bosch Jr <jfvbjr@...>
>
>Go back and check the spell again, I believe you will find that we need
>Poison Vials
>
>Tinkerten Iktomi
>Gnome Enchanter 29th season
>Blood Tide Traffic Controll
>Solusek Ro
>
>-----Original Message-----
>From: Conrad Lesnewski [mailto:clesnew@...]
>Sent: Tuesday, November 23, 1999 7:41 PM
>To: EQ_Potters@onelist.com
>Subject: RE: [EQ_Potters] Lined Vials
>
>
>From: Conrad Lesnewski <clesnew@...>
>
>
>No, we don't. Only regular vials are needed to produce Thickened or Cloudy
>Mana.
>
>Calbasil Psyrex of Ak'Anon (Bertoxx)
>Enchanter of the 32nd Level
>House of Silmindo
>
>Master Baker
>Master Brewer
>Master Beggar
>Master Fisher
>Master Jeweler
>Master Smith
>Senior Journeyman Tailor
>Journeyman Tinker
>
>High Master of doing anything to waste my hard earned cash and avoid
>spending time leveling :)
>
>
>
>At 04:02 PM 11/23/99 -0700, you wrote:
>>
>>I thought enchanters only needed regular vials. They use lined too??
>>
>>Tanana (Bristlebane)
>>Master Brewer
>>Master Potter
>>Master Beggar
>>
>
>>
>
